articles.title: Linford Christie accuses police of institutional racism after athletes were stopped and restrained - Mirror Online
articles.description: British Olympic 100m champion demands an explanation on behalf of his clients for what he condemns as an abuse of police powers
articles.content:
Linford Christie has accused the Metropolitan Police of institutional racism after two athletes he manages were stopped and handcuffed while driving with their three-month-old baby.
